ygData.subject: Survey
ygData.msgSnippet: As we all know, the right atmosphere is required for total immersion into character so... When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite: Day of the
ygData.messageBody:
As we all know, the right atmosphere is required for total immersion into
character so...

When playing your bard in Norrath what is your favorite:

Day of the week to play: Friday night, as it is Thurdsay night in the US. I live in Brisbane Australia and can play late Friday night with very few in the game.

Time of day: 6-12pm (Works out 1-5am US Time) Perfect for EQ less than 300 on the server.

Longest stretch of continuous play: 13 hours, I get this aweful cramp and call on my boyfriend to rub it.

Way to have game sounds: Average, It starts load and get quieter as it gets darker.

Distance to sit from display: Ams length (Strange Question)

TV show to have on: None.. distracts from the game

Music to listen to: I listen to 5 Clannad CDs on random, all the atmosphere I need.

Beverage (non-alcoholic): Coffee

Beverage (alcoholic): Coffee with whiskey

Health Food: Doesnt coffee come from a plant ?

Junk Food: Anything sweet, like me

Clothes to wear: hehe *Blush*

Shinara Daitengu
Tarew Marr
